DECENTRALIZED CLOUD TECHNOLOGY

A fundamentally new approach to a peer-to-peer data economy. Empowering data privacy and sovereignty through decentralized Web 3.0 infrastructure.

THE CYBERPANDEMIC ERA

NEVER BEFORE WAS SECURITY SO ESSENTIAL. As the world’s population increasingly moves online amid a global pandemic, cyber attacks have rapidly surged as well. Both companies and individuals now face security risks that can no longer be ignored.

ThreeFold has successfully created and implemented highly-scalable technology which is helping to advance the transition to decentralization at unprecedented rates; allowing all types of workloads to work more efficiently and securely.

FIRST USE CASE - THE THREEFOLD GRID

Bringing a smart, secure and efficient network solution that allows anyone to connect capacity and participate in the Internet economy.
An upgrade from today's centralized data center model.

Secure. Fast. Private. Decentralized. Peer to Peer. Planet Friendly. Alive.
